attributes.action: Give All Children Money To Spend On Games During The Corona Virus Pandemic.
attributes.additional_details: Because It Will Reduce The Amount Of People Still Going Outside Because Of Boredom.
attributes.background: They Should Give Money To Under 18s So They Can Buy Things To Keep Them Safe At Home

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we're not sure whether you want to the UK Parliament and Government to give children money or whether you'd like something different.

You might like to sign and share this petition about raising child benefit:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300774

You could also start a new petition asking for a voucher scheme for toys, games and children's entertainment.
